insert into tbl_sys_user (v_user_id,v_username, v_password, open_id, v_name, v_email, v_mobile, i_status, v_sex, v_birth, v_pic_id, v_provincial_city, v_address, v_hobby, i_work_order_flag, i_send_phone_status, i_send_message_status, dt_createTime, dt_modifyTime, v_createid, v_modifyid) values
(#{vUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{item.vUsername,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.vPassword,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.openId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.vName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.vEmail,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.vMobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.iStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.vSex,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.vBirth,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{item.vPicId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.vProvincialCity,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.vAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.vHobby,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.iWorkOrderFlag,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.iSendPhoneStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.iSendMessageStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.dtCreatetime,jdbcType=OTHER}, #{item.dtModifytime,jdbcType=OTHER}, #{item.vCreateid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.vModifyid,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

update tbl_sys_user
v_username = #{vUsername,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
v_password = #{vPassword,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
open_id = #{openId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
v_name = #{vName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
v_email = #{vEmail,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
v_mobile = #{vMobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
i_status = #{iStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER},
v_sex = #{vSex,jdbcType=INTEGER},
v_birth = #{vBirth,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
v_pic_id = #{vPicId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
v_provincial_city = #{vProvincialCity,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
v_address = #{vAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
v_hobby = #{vHobby,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
i_work_order_flag = #{iWorkOrderFlag,jdbcType=INTEGER},
i_send_phone_status = #{iSendPhoneStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER},
i_send_message_status = #{iSendMessageStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER},
dt_createTime = #{dtCreatetime,jdbcType=OTHER},
dt_modifyTime = #{dtModifytime,jdbcType=OTHER},
v_createid = #{vCreateid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
v_modifyid = #{vModifyid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where v_user_id = #{vUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

#{item}
mapper.select: SELECT u.* FROM tbl_sys_user_resource r LEFT JOIN tbl_elevator ele ON ele.v_elevator_id = r.v_resource_id INNER JOIN tbl_sys_user u ON u.v_user_id = r.v_user_id WHERE ele.v_elevator_code = #{elevatorCode}

select `user`.v_mobile from tbl_sys_user `user` join tbl_sys_user_role `roleuser` on `roleuser`.v_user_id = `user`.v_user_id join tbl_sys_role `role` on `role`.v_role_id = `roleuser`.v_role_id WHERE `role`.v_role_id = '1285876340913999872' and user.i_send_message_status = 0;
select u.* from tbl_elevator_principal p JOIN tbl_sys_user u ON p.principal_id = u.v_user_id where p.v_elevator_id = #{elevatorId}
select u.* from tbl_elevator_principal p JOIN tbl_sys_user u ON p.principal_id = u.v_user_id GROUP BY u.v_user_id
